title: Cricut Deep-Point Blade + Housing, Cutting Blade with Deep Cut Housing, Cut Materials up to 1.5mm Thickness, For Personalized Crafts, Compatible With Cricut Maker and Explore Machines,Black
description: Creating personalized crafts has become easy with Cricut accessories and to enhance the beauty of these crafts, Cricut is here with Deep Point Blade + Housing, a 1-1/8 inch blade and 2-1/4 inch deep cut housing to hold it. This cutting tool allows you to cut the desired shapes on a wider variety of materials and apply them to your projects. This blade and housing are compatible with your Cricut Maker and Explore machines (including Explore, Explore One, Explore Air, and Explore Air 2). With the steeper blade angle (60 degrees vs 45) and harder steel, this deep point blade precisely cut the magnet, chipboard, rubber sheets, thick cardstock, stiffened felt, foam sheets, cardboard, specialty papers, and other thick materials up to 1.5mm of thickness to create customized magnets, wall calendars, stamps, and more for glorifying your DIY projects. With their impressive range of Cricut accessories, ultimate smart cutting machines, tools, craft supplies & materials, you can make your personal, DIY projects more fun and easier.
